title: Athens Foods, Inc. Recalls Beef Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 6, 2015 Athens Foods, Inc., a Cleveland, Ohio establishment, is recalling approximately 168 pounds of beef products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains soy, known allergens which...
